text: Graham a huge soccer fan and developer
is building a live commentary app with
AWS generative
AI until now he's been testing the app
with existing timestamp data but today
he is nervous today is the big day
Graham is plugging in realtime soccer
match data using Amazon Kinesis so that
it can produce realtime commentary data
for live games Graham knows that AWS
gives him the team of tools needed to
bring real time data into his app it's a
great success and Graham's app is now
able to produce data for live games all
over the world still Graham has a slight
problem the app while functional and
informative lacks the flow and insight
of conversational commentary soccer fans
expect context that brings insights to
the game luckily for Graham Amazon
Bedrock has a wide range of foundation
models to choose from Once integrated
Graham's commentary app works great
thanks to Amazon Bedrock now listeners
feel it when the striker voles the
keeper sweetly looping the ball into the
top Corner igniting a deafening Roar
from the crowd Graham's app is also now
ready for the big time however he lacks
the knoow to scale his app
up Stephanie is a Season Pro who knows
just how to take an upstart app to the
big leagues allowing new fans to log in
with Amazon Cognito and interact with
the commentary using Amazon cloudfront
Stephanie distributes the live
commentary to a growing audience of
soccer fans who sign into the app
allowing them to receive push
notifications of important moments usern
numbers are skyrocketing without the lag
AS application load balancer handles
incoming and outgoing traffic Stephanie
realizes that as well as listening to
the commentary audio an even greater
number of people could be tuning in Via
social media feeds viewing a second
screen or catching highlight
notifications while on the move AWS
gives the pair the tools to adjust their
game plan on the
Fly thanks to bedrock and lambda's
integration with Amazon poly Stephanie
and gra can combine real-time data
streams outputting commentary in
multiple languages across blogs new
segments and even 280 character social
media posts filled to the brim with
excitement the app Stephanie and graah
created now delivers play-by-play
action-packed live stats and detailed
analysis to soccer fans around the
world great job
